title: BucksBus
author: BucksBus
created_time: September 26, 2023, 11:44:48 AMLast edit: December 27, 2023, 11:29:44 AM by BucksBus
content: https://drive.google.com/file/d/11wXtNVUYkjXbUeAc9L53IMa2pJ17MLf6/view?usp=sharingBucksBus.com is a Crypto Payment Solution for Business that allows to accept crypto payments directly to your wallet.With no third party and KYC. At one of the industry’s lowest fees.Why It is the Best Solution for YouNo third party. Crypto goes directly from customer’s wallet to merchant's wallet, eliminating the risk of blocking. The lowest fees in the industry. $0.7 per transaction, and if the number of transactions exceeds 360, a fixed monthly fee of $250 per month will be charged, regardless of turnover.No KYC required. Start accepting crypto with just your email, and we won't require KYC in the future.100% SafeWe don’t touch your crypto. Payments go directly from customer's wallet to your merchant's wallet – Bucksbus just provides the service.Moreover, you can restore your BucksBus wallet with all the funds on various platforms, such as Trust Wallet, Ledger, etc.Supported CoinsBitcoinTether (TRC-20)EthereumTronTether (ERC-20)Start accepting crypot right now - just register at BucksBus.com with your emailFirst month is for free!

comments.author: BucksBus
comments.created_time: April 23, 2024, 02:08:19 PMLast edit: May 08, 2024, 10:49:19 AM by BucksBus
comments.body: Calculate your potential savings with BucksBus using our new calculator!We've simplified the process for you by creating a calculator that determines your potential savings with BucksBus. Simply input your current (or potential) fee for your crypto payment provider service, the number of transactions, and the average transaction amount, and our calculator will show you how much you could save by switching to BucksBus  For example, let's consider a scenario where you have 10,000 transactions averaging $100 each month ($1M/m). Most crypto payment service providers charge a percentage of your turnover, typically within the range of 0.3% to 3%. Let's assume it's 0.5%. With this fee structure, you would be paying $5,000. In contrast, our solution offers the same service for just $250. That's a 95% optimization in your costs!Visit bucksbus.com now to calculate your potential savings and see how BucksBus can help you maximize your profits!

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: I was trying to read through the Frequently Asked Question on your website and there is absolutely no link to it. Why?How is someone supposed to know about your service in brief is there are no FAQs?You say "BucksBus is a brand of NetTradeX, registered in the United Arab Emirates" but on checking NetTradeX, they don't mention your service anywhere. Their correspondence address Nettradex Limited 38, Spyrou Kyprianou street, office 101, Germasogeya, 4042, Limassol, Cyprus. How is this possible?

comments.author: BucksBus
comments.body: BucksBus Adds Litecoin to its Portfolio of Supported Cryptos 🚀We are pleased to announce that Litecoin is now among the cryptocurrencies available on BucksBus! This expansion increases the number of cryptocurrencies we support to six, including Bitcoin, Ethereum, Tether (available on both TRC20 and ERC20 networks), and Tron, enhancing flexibility and choice for your business transactions.At BucksBus, we're dedicated to continually evolving to meet the needs of our clients. If your business requires additional cryptocurrencies, please get in touch to discuss your needs.

comments.author: BucksBus
comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoin_Arena on April 30, 2024, 01:33:32 PMI was trying to read through the Frequently Asked Question on your website and there is absolutely no link to it. Why?How is someone supposed to know about your service in brief is there are no FAQs?You say "BucksBus is a brand of NetTradeX, registered in the United Arab Emirates" but on checking NetTradeX, they don't mention your service anywhere. Their correspondence address Nettradex Limited 38, Spyrou Kyprianou street, office 101, Germasogeya, 4042, Limassol, Cyprus. How is this possible?Thank you for your interest in our platform! We do have FAQ, which is located in the 'Before You Pay' section. However, you may be right that it's not clear, so we will consider reorganizing it.Regarding Nettradex, BucksBus was developed by the team that built this platform, but it belongs to a company registered in the UAE, which we have made clear on our website.

comments.author: RonKoetse@protonmail.com
comments.body: Hi! We tried to test your service  and after 2 deposit - your service - got stuck - it  is sending mails ( already more than 100) and shows that we made more than 100 transactions - says we owe you more than 77 usd just only for these 2 deposits ... We sent you msg 12 hours ago, still havent received any response. screenshot here : https://snipboard.io/zEh510.jpg  Please contact us ASAP

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Quote from: RonKoetse@protonmail.com on May 13, 2024, 08:03:55 AMHi! We tried to test your service  and after 2 deposit - your service - got stuck - it  is sending mails ( already more than 100) and shows that we made more than 100 transactions - says we owe you more than 77 usd just only for these 2 deposits ... We sent you msg 12 hours ago, still havent received any response. screenshot here : https://snipboard.io/zEh510.jpg  Please contact us ASAP Hi, I am a little bit confused. You said you made 2 deposits, but then there are some 109 payments. From where does number come from? I have checked out the screenshot and it doesn't make sense. Perhaps it's a bug?OP was online today after your post, have you received any response via PM? Please keep us updated on the issue. It's very important feedback for potential future customers.

comments.author: RonKoetse@protonmail.com
comments.body: Hi! Yes it was bug - BucksBus team contacted us and started to fix it. Lets see...

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Quote from: Blackbacked on May 14, 2024, 12:09:59 AMCan you accept Monero?I created a test account and checked the dashboard. I don't see monero listed there. This is all I could see.Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, Tron, Tether (ERC20), Tether (TRC20). I don't know how flexible they are. It might be a good suggestion adding monero as well.

This is all I could see.Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, Tron, Tether (ERC20), Tether (TRC20). I don't know how flexible they are. It might be a good suggestion adding monero as well.I know. It was a suggestion to the owner to add Monero.

comments.author: BucksBus
comments.body: Quote from: Blackbacked on May 14, 2024, 12:09:59 AMCan you accept Monero?Hello, for now we don't accept Monero, but we can add it in case our client needs it. Please write to hello@bucksbus.com and we'll discuss it.

comments.author: BucksBus
comments.body: One crucial aspect you might overlook when choosing a crypto PSP  Did you know that the addresses you use for accepting crypto payments can be static or dynamic? Many merchants are unaware of this key difference.In our latest Medium Article, we dive deep into the pros and cons of each type of address and guide you on when to use them. Understanding this can significantly impact your transaction efficiency and security.Curious to learn more? Read the full article and stay informed!https://medium.com/p/202b4e3c3227

comments.author: BucksBus
comments.body: 📢 Thrilled to announce that we have launched a WordPress plugin! 🚀 Integrating BucksBus crypto payments solution into your WordPress website has never been easier. Head over to WordPress website, download the plugin, and check out the easy installation guide🔗. https://[Suspicious link removed]/eagxfVJDJoin the future of payments with BucksBus and make crypto transactions a breeze for your WordPress site! 🌐✨

comments.author: BucksBus
comments.body: SWAP in BucksBus now! 🚀 We are thrilled to announce the launch of our new cryptocurrency swap feature. Now, you can easily exchange one cryptocurrency for another directly within our service.For example, if you receive payments in Bitcoin but prefer to hold USDT (TRC20), simply click the Exchange button, select your desired currencies, and complete the swap effortlessly.At BucksBus, we are committed to enhancing your experience every day. Sign up now and give it a try!
